name: Word Smasher
description:
• Word Smasher is the ultimate power in crossword and word puzzle/game aids.
• Fully updated for iOS 11 and iPhone X
• New look and feel – modern and easy to use
• SMASH! single and multi-word puzzles and games using known letters, anagrams & crossing words simultaneously!

It’s more than a simple anagram search.
It’s more than a simple known/missing letter search.
It’s a multi-faceted tool for SMASHING! word puzzles and games of all varieties.

CROSSWORDS

Do you know some letters of a crossword answer? Put in your known letters and blanks to find all possible solutions.

Do and you know some anagram letters as well? Add those letters into the search and narrow the answers down.

Does your clue have a multiword answer (like “apple pie”)? No problem. Word Smasher will show you all the combinations that fit multiword answers.

Do you know some letters of a word going across, and some of a word going down? Put in your known and anagram letters for both words, tell Word Smasher where the words cross over and find both answers simultaneously!

ANAGRAMS, JUMBLES, SCRABBLE™, WORDS WITH FRIENDS™ and other Word Games

Do you have some letters to unjumble? Let Word Smasher solve your problem for single or multiword puzzles and games.

Do your jumbled letters include blanks? No problem. Word Smasher allows for unlimited blanks

Do you need to find all the x-letter words from a larger word? No problem. Word smasher will find all the possible subwords of any length from a given (larger) number of anagram letters.
